segments.text: Is that you , Dave ? Oh , my gosh ! The backstabber who left us to work for the evil WebTracker !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , yeah , yeah . Hi , Mary . How are you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm filthy rich ! Haven't you heard about the MicroPower deal ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I guess I did . They're going to buy invoking ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's right . For seventy-five million . So how are you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm getting by OK . I heard MicroPower was going to make Zina president of their new invoking Internet division .
segments.speaker: S2
